subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Donato Lanni arrived in Lexington, Ky., in 1996 with a lifelong dream but no connections, and made himself one of the most sought-after thoroughbred scouts in North America.
snippet: Donato Lanni arrived in Lexington, Ky., in 1996 with a lifelong dream but no connections, and made himself one of the most sought-after thoroughbred scouts in North America.
